alert.note: Alert for Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:56PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mitchell and southern Mower Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 756 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near London, or 7 miles south of Austin, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rose Creek around 805 PM CDT. Adams around 810 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Johnsburg, Varco, County Roads 4 And 8, Taopi, County Roads 56 And 5 and Riverbend Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Iowa...and southeastern Minnesota.
